mapper.insert: insert into tb_recruit (id, jobname, salary, condition, education, type, address, eid, createtime, state, url, label, content1, content2) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_recruit set jobname = #{jobname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary = #{salary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, condition = #{condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content1 = #{content1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content2 = #{content2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, jobname, salary, condition, education, type, address, eid, createtime, state, url, label, content1, content2 from tb_recruit where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, jobname, salary, condition, education, type, address, eid, createtime, state, url, label, content1, content2 from tb_recruit
